lender.name: icamea
lender.loan_because: there are complicated things to face in real life.
lender.occupational_info:
"I woke up this morning, wasn't feeling any pain hoping for the sunshine, but ended up with rain.
I make it to the kitchen ,to get me some coffee to go I'll never make it on time, because I'm moving so slow.
Hurrying out the door, so I could make it to the car rushing down the interstate, didn't make it to far.
I hit something in the road, and cut my tire sat beside the road, for more than an hour.
Tried to call the office, but the didn't bring my phone in such a big rush, I must have left it at home.
Were alway in a hurry, to go get the job done never have any time, to stop and have some fun.
Got angry at the car, and decided to sit for a spell but I stepped on a bottle, and some how I fell.
Something told me, I should have stayed in bed now I'm laid up in the hospital, just about dead.
All for that stupid job, so I wouldn't be late sometimes we forget, that jobs not so great.
A serious price to pay, to make in on time now I'm laying in the hospital, not making a dime."
___________________________________ http://elasticorangedagger.blogetery.com

lender.name: Florence K, Friend of KF
lender.loan_because:
We at kivafriends.org deeply believe in Florence Kaluuba of Mirembe Community College and her struggling but determined students. These brave young women are striving, in the face of obstacles that most of us have never had to confront, to improve their own lives and the lives of their families through perseverance, education and just plain hard work.
We connected with Florence because she, originally, was a Kiva entrepreneur, herself, and some of us at KivaFriends were among her first lenders. Having gotten to know her over the years, we now, more than ever, want to continue to support her work and express our admiration for her and for her girls. So, these loans will be made to honor the women of Mirembe Community College and to spread the word of their triumph over naysayers and adversity. http://fellowsblog.kiva.org/2007/12/11/mikembe-youth-development-project/
If you'd like to learn more, both about Mirembe Community College and KivaFriends' sweet and ongoing relationship with them, check out: http://www.kivafriends.org/index.php/topic,1492.0.html
lender.occupational_info: NOTE: This account was originally created by members of kivafriends.org. Now, a couple of months later, we've decided we want to turn it over to our friend, Florence Kaluuba of Mirembe Community College in Kampala, Uganda. Our idea is that she, perhaps along with some of her students, can now make loans to others as we, at KivaFriends, once made a loan to them. That the circle will be unbroken....
